mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.type AS "type", a.name AS "name", a.facevalue AS "facevalue"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_coupon( id, type, name, orgname, startdate, enddate, facevalue, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{type}, #{name}, #{orgname}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{facevalue}, #{status} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_coupon SET type = #{type}, name = #{name}, orgname = #{orgname}, startdate = #{startdate}, enddate = #{enddate}, facevalue = #{facevalue}, status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
